title: How to Enter a Guinness Book of Records Entry

steps.headline: Head to the Guinness World Records website.
Register for an account on the site.
Complete the Online application.
steps.description: You will have to have your intended record ready before this.

steps.headline: Print your completed application for your reference.

text: Head to the Guinness World Records website.  Click on "Break A World Record".  Register for an account on the site.  Complete the Online application. You will have to have your intended record ready before this. Print your completed application for your reference.  Wait 4-6 weeks.
